Uses of Interface
quarks.connectors.iot.IotDevice

  • Packages that use IotDevice 
    Package Description
    quarks.apps.iot
    Applications for use in an Internet of Things environment.
    quarks.connectors.iotf
    IBM Watson IoT Platform stream connector.
    quarks.connectors.mqtt.iot
    An MQTT based IotDevice connector.
    quarks.providers.iot
    Iot provider that allows multiple applications to share an IotDevice.
    quarks.samples.connectors.iotf
    Samples showing device events and commands with IBM Watson IoT Platform.
    quarks.test.svt.apps.iotf

    • Uses of IotDevice in quarks.samples.connectors.iotf

      Methods in quarks.samples.connectors.iotf with parameters of type IotDevice 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TStream<java.lang.String> IotfSensors.displayMessages(IotDevice device, boolean print)
      Subscribe to IoTF device commands with identifier display.
      static void IotfSensors.heartBeat(IotDevice device, boolean print)
      Create a heart beat device event with identifier heartbeat to ensure there is some immediate output and the connection to IoTF happens as soon as possible.
      static void IotfSensors.simulatedSensors(IotDevice device, boolean print)
      Simulate two bursty sensors and send the readings as IoTF device events with an identifier of sensors.
